mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.geocoding, a.postal_code, a.parent_id, a.parent_ids, a.create_by, a.create_date, a.update_by, a.update_date, a.del_flag, a.remarks, (select count(*) from test_tree_table s WHERE s.parent_id=a.id) as hasChildren
mapper.update:
update test_tree_table set parent_ids= CONCAT(#{newParentIds},
substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
substr(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
substring(parent_ids, len(#{oldParentIds})+1,len(parent_ids)+1))
where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from test_tree_table where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
